author: Goldy
content:
"That would give us 5 transactions x 60 secs x 60 minutes x 24 hours x 30 days x 0.20 cents per transaction = a loss of $1,2960,000 in a month."

The number I got was $2,592,000.  I think you forgot the .20 cents in your math.

Love the site man, keep up the good work.
